pageContext.claim: “The other thing is—this wasn’t me. This [Michael Cohen guilty plea] was having to do with the taxi industry or something. But he has—and financing, but nothing to do with me.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. Cohen's guilty plea included an admission that Trump directed him to pay off the porn actress Stormy Daniels during the 2016 campaign, to prevent her from disclosing an affair she said she had with Trump in 2006.
